--- title: "2018-07: The Sum of Its Parts" format: html: toc: true --- ::: {.cell hash='2018-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_e3f864d9e59c4ddeb84dbe063b984452'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ── ✔ ggplot2 3.3.6 ✔ purrr 0.3.4 ✔ tibble 3.1.8 ✔ dplyr 1.0.10 ✔ tidyr 1.2.0 ✔ stringr 1.4.1 ✔ readr 2.1.2 ✔ forcats 0.5.2 ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(data.table) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'data.table' The following objects are masked from 'package:dplyr': between, first, last The following object is masked from 'package:purrr': transpose ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='2018-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_0e932e7184d33a3fdce1bdd233778674'} ```{.r .cell-code} dt <- fread("test.txt", header = FALSE) |> select(V2, V8) |> rename("predecessor" = V2, "task" = V8) t <- dt$task p <- dt$predecessor head(dt) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` predecessor task 1: C A 2: C F 3: A B 4: A D 5: B E 6: D E ``` ::: ::: ## Part 1 ::: {.cell hash='2018-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_b4385c50c3ea94cd459348d0d9e29b85'} ```{.r .cell-code} DiagrammeR::mermaid(c("graph LR;", apply(dt[rowSums(is.na(dt)) == 0, ], 1, function(x) { paste0(x["predecessor"], " --> ", x["task"], ";") }))) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='2018-07_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_36be710511ad9941af50adda29660859'} ```{.r .cell-code} start <- unique(p[!(p %in% t)]) end <- unique(t[!(t %in% p)]) vec <- c() ls <- list() getParent <- function(x) { x <- dt$predecessor[dt$task %in% x] if(length(x) > 0) { x <- rev(sort(unique(x))) ls <<- append(ls, paste(rev(x), collapse = "")) vec <<- c(vec, x) return(getParent(x)) } else { return(x) } } getParent(end) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` character(0) ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lapply(ls, function(x) { unique(str_split(x, "")) }) |> rev() |> unlist() |> unique() -> vec paste(c(vec, end), collapse = "") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "CABDFE" ``` ::: ::: KVCSHBXDQMJGFZYROUAPLIEWTN CKVSHBXDQMJGFZYROUAPLIEWTN KVCBSHXDJMGQFYRZOAULPIEWTN KCVBHSDXFGJMQRYZOAULPIEWTN
